subject: Track and Field
Deaths (Obituaries)
Writing and Writers
Magazines
Amateur Athletics
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Covering the sport for more than a half-century, Mr. Nelson, a tall and dignified presence, attended 15 Olympics and wrote books and originated the magazine’s annual world rankings.
snippet: Covering the sport for more than a half-century, Mr. Nelson, a tall and dignified presence, attended 15 Olympics and wrote books and originated the magazine’s annual world rankings.
